participants.name: Allie Kinzler
participants.title: Graduate Student at DePaul University - Charles H. Kellstadt Graduate School of Business

messages.message:
Open to New Opportunities

Hi Brian, 

I came across your LinkedIn profile & see that you are currently open to hearing about new opportunities. I am a Java focused recruiter for TEKsystems and would love to tell you more about the current market trends I am seeing & what companies are hiring for technical professionals like yourself!

Let me know when you are free today for a quick phone call to discuss what your preferences are for your next role so I can identify the best opportunity for you. 

Looking forward to your reply!

Allie Kinzler
Sorry I don't work well with others. :(
